Package com.intellij.openapi.vcs.rollback

Interface RollbackEnvironment

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CvsRollbackEnvironment, DefaultRollbackEnvironment, GitRollbackEnvironment, HgRollbackEnvironment, SvnRollbackEnvironment

    public interface RollbackEnvironment
    Interface for performing VCS rollback / revert operations.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default java.util.Collection<? extends AnAction> createCustomRollbackActions() 
      java.lang.String getRollbackOperationName()
      Returns the name of operation which is shown in the UI (in menu item name, dialog title and button text).
      void rollbackChanges(java.util.List<Change> changes, java.util.List<VcsException> vcsExceptions, RollbackProgressListener listener)
      Rolls back the specified changes.
      void rollbackIfUnchanged(VirtualFile file)
      This is called when the user performs an undo that returns a file to a state in which it was checked out or last saved.
      void rollbackMissingFileDeletion(java.util.List<FilePath> files, java.util.List<VcsException> exceptions, RollbackProgressListener listener)
      Rolls back the deletion of files which have been deleted locally but not scheduled for deletion from VCS.
      void rollbackModifiedWithoutCheckout(java.util.List<VirtualFile> files, java.util.List<VcsException> exceptions, RollbackProgressListener listener)
      Rolls back the modifications of files which have been made writable but not properly checked out from VCS.

    • Method Detail

      • getRollbackOperationName

        java.lang.String getRollbackOperationName()
        Returns the name of operation which is shown in the UI (in menu item name, dialog title and button text).
        Returns:
        the user-readable name of operation (for example, "Rollback" or "Revert").

      • rollbackChanges

        void rollbackChanges(java.util.List<Change> changes,
                     java.util.List<VcsException> vcsExceptions,
                     RollbackProgressListener listener)
        Rolls back the specified changes.
        Parameters:
        changes - the changes to roll back.
        vcsExceptions -
        listener -

      • rollbackMissingFileDeletion

        void rollbackMissingFileDeletion(java.util.List<FilePath> files,
                                 java.util.List<VcsException> exceptions,
                                 RollbackProgressListener listener)
        Rolls back the deletion of files which have been deleted locally but not scheduled for deletion from VCS. The implementation of this method should get the current version of the listed files from VCS. You do not need to implement this method if you never report such files to ChangelistBuilder.processLocallyDeletedFile(com.intellij.openapi.vcs.FilePath).
        Parameters:
        files - the files to rollback deletion of.
        exceptions -
        listener - @return list of errors occurred, or an empty list if no errors occurred.

      • rollbackModifiedWithoutCheckout

        void rollbackModifiedWithoutCheckout(java.util.List<VirtualFile> files,
                                     java.util.List<VcsException> exceptions,
                                     RollbackProgressListener listener)
        Rolls back the modifications of files which have been made writable but not properly checked out from VCS. You do not need to implement this method if you never report such files to ChangelistBuilder.processModifiedWithoutCheckout(com.intellij.openapi.vfs.VirtualFile).
        Parameters:
        files - the files to rollback.
        exceptions -
        listener - @return list of errors occurred, or an empty list if no errors occurred.

      • rollbackIfUnchanged

        void rollbackIfUnchanged(VirtualFile file)
        This is called when the user performs an undo that returns a file to a state in which it was checked out or last saved. The implementation of this method can compare the current state of file with the base revision and undo the checkout if the file is identical. Implementing this method is optional.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to rollback.

      • createCustomRollbackActions

        default java.util.Collection<? extends AnAction> createCustomRollbackActions()
        Returns:
        the list of VCS-specific rollback-flavoured actions to show in Commit dialog
